1.1.name: wordpress/contextual-ppc-revenue-by-advtisecom
1.1.description:
Advtise Contextual revenue plugin enables you to automatically insert ad revenue code in to your posts on the fly. You can specify various options such as; style, colors, number of ads, formats and Advtise Contextual revenue plugin will automatically insert the code for you into all your posts.

Download now!

Features: 1. Automatically insert Advtise partner ads in to your blog posts. 2. No manual work required, ad code is dynamically inserted into your existing and new posts. 3. You could optionally specify not to show ads in a post by using tag 4. You could optionally specify where to start the ads in a post by using tag 5. Decrease ad blindness by giving you the option to randomly place your ad within your posts. 6. You could optionally define absolute ad position instead of random position. 7. You could optionally define random ad network to maximize earnings from both networks. 8. Allow
